answers.answer: My son has similar problems.He suffers with insomnia, sleepy during the day, stomache pains, loss of appetite, tight leg muscles, and sometimes sore throats.He was told by a specialist in lyme disease that he has a bartonella infection. This infection can also cause anxiety, cause you to become more emotional, sore feet, night sweats, anemia, shortness of breath at times, abdominal pain, soreness around joints of the body, headaches, a rash that can look like broken blood vessels or stretch marks, and light sensitivity.Anyone in the world can get this infection. It is carried by ticks, flees, cats and certain kinds of flies. It is difficult to test for. Most lyme specialists treat this infection by symptoms alone. My son takes a Chinese herb that is suppose to kill it. It is called HH by Hepapro.Look up bartonella. There is 28+ different kinds.
